Windsor Circle (Durham NC)

- Senior Python and JavaScript developers

- System Administrator

=====================================

We're hiring developers to join our funded startup (in 2014 we closed a $6.25M Series B) to help us build and expand our market leading Retention Automation Platform.

Our tech stack includes Python, Pyramid, and PostgreSQL on the backend and Backbone.js/Marionette on the front end. This is an exciting opportunity to get in on the ground floor with salary and stock options while working with cutting edge technology. Telecommuting is available 1-2 days/wk with the rest of your time spent in our awesome downtown Durham, North Carolina office.

More info here: http://www.windsorcircle.com/jobs
